sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext} from 'react' import diomond from './diomond.png' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import total from './total.png' import mycontext from './Context/Createcontext' function Navbar() { const navigate=useNavigate() const {Note}=useContext(mycontext) let sumOfwork = Note.reduce((sum, currentItem) => sum + currentItem.dailywork, 0); const hendleLogout=()=>{ localStorage.removeItem('token') navigate('/login') } return (
HIRADAYRI

{localStorage.getItem('token')? sumOfwork: " "}

{!localStorage.getItem('token')?
Login Sinup
:}
) } export default Navbar
